description: SSP-based RCP scenario following approximately RCP7.0 global forcing pathway. SSP3 socioeconomic conditions.  Atmosphere only with SST from ScenarioMIP experiment SSP3-70.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, scenario, SSP3, RCP7.0, atmosphere only,
long_name: SSP3-7.0, with  SSTs prescribed from ssp370
rationale: Control for ERF estimates of individual NTCF.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the mid 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2055 41yrs

requirements.description: Sea surface temperature from experiment SSP3-7.
requirements.keywords: SSP3-7, SSP3, RCP7.0, SST, sea surface temperature
requirements.label: SSP3-70 SST

requirements.description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP7.0 tropospheric ozone precursors.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, tropospheric ozone precursors
requirements.label: RCP70 Tropospheric Ozone Precursors

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0
requirements.label: RCP70 Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use an Atmosphere model with chemistry
requirements.label: AGCM-Chem Configuration
